DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of DuoTrav Eye Drops in gaining or maintaining control of target Intraocular Pressures (tIOP) in patients diagnosed with, and being treated for, open-angle glaucoma (OAG) or ocular hypertension (OH).
DOC.brief_title: DuoTravÂ® Eye Drops As Replacement Therapy Program
DOC.criteria: Patients with OAG or OH for whom single agent therapy provides insufficient intraocular pressure reduction
